peachbox.spark module¶

class peachbox.spark.Spark(spark_conf={})[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface to Apache Spark. Singleton. After initialization use peachbox.spark.Instance() to access the existing instance.:

class HelloWorld()
    def __init__():
static Instance()[source]¶

Spark is a singleton. Access via Instance()

context()[source]¶

Spark context

Returns a SQLContext, which is the entry point to PySparks’ data frames.
